SEARCH
Package com.wordweave.utils

Class PasswordUtil

java.lang.Object
com.wordweave.utils.PasswordUtil
public class PasswordUtil extends Object
Utility class for secure password encryption and decryption using AES-GCM. Provides methods for generating cryptographic keys, encrypting passwords, and decrypting them using username as part of the key derivation.

  • Method Details

    • getRandomNonce

      public static byte[] getRandomNonce(int numBytes)
      Generates a secure random nonce (number used once) of specified length.
      Parameters:
      numBytes - The length of the nonce in bytes
      Returns:
      A byte array containing random bytes

    • getAESKey

      public static SecretKey getAESKey(int keysize) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Generates a new AES secret key of specified size.
      Parameters:
      keysize - The key size in bits (128, 192, or 256)
      Returns:
      A new SecretKey for AES encryption
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If AES algorithm is not available

    • getAESKeyFromPassword

      public static SecretKey getAESKeyFromPassword(char[] password, byte[] salt)
      Derives an AES key from a password using PBKDF2 with HMAC-SHA256.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to derive the key from
      salt - The random salt for key derivation
      Returns:
      Derived SecretKey or null if derivation fails

    • encrypt

      public static String encrypt(String username, String password)
      Encrypts a password using AES-GCM with username-derived key.
      Parameters:
      username - Used as part of key derivation (treated as password in PBKDF2)
      password - The plaintext password to encrypt
      Returns:
      Base64-encoded string containing IV + salt + ciphertext, or null if encryption fails

    • decrypt

      public static String decrypt(String encryptedPassword, String username)
      Decrypts a password encrypted by the encrypt() method.
      Parameters:
      encryptedPassword - The Base64-encoded encrypted password (IV + salt + ciphertext)
      username - The username used during encryption for key derivation
      Returns:
      The decrypted plaintext password, or null if decryption fails
